Name: Journal of Jinzhou: Vo.1
Description: You see two engaging in a heated discussion on the journal. Go and check what has happened.
QuestDesc: You see two engaging in a heated discussion on the journal. Go and check what has happened.

Dialogues.Speaker: Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The textbooks are boring enough already, sis. Can’t we make the magazine just a little more interesting?

Dialogues.Speaker: Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why don’t we just go to the theater and hire a storyteller to add a few finishing touches for us?

Dialogues.Speaker: Female Instructor
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How many times have I told you, writing a publication is a very serious matter, even if it’s an extracurricular one?

Dialogues.Speaker: Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If the magazine is boring, how can you expect it to become popular with students?

Dialogues.Speaker: Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wouldn’t it contradict the very purpose behind starting the magazine?

Dialogues.Speaker: Female Instructor
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You’re right. A popular magazine needs to set itself apart from an academic journal. I should think from our readers’ perspective.

Dialogues.Speaker: Female Instructor
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Thanks for the reminder. I nearly got caught up in the details again!

Dialogues.Speaker: Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, I’m a potential reader too, you know!

Dialogues.Speaker: Female Instructor
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Potential reader... That makes sense. I should listen to people’s thoughts and opinions more!

Dialogues.Speaker: Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hehe, there you go!

Dialogues.Speaker: Girl
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please excuse me, friend that’s passing by. My name is Xingzhu, and you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh! I’ve heard of the name. The incredible Rover.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With your skills, can I ask you a favor in lending my sister a hand?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don’t worry, it won’t take you long. It’s really just a small favor, please!

Dialogues.Speaker: Female Instructor
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ahem. Hello, {PlayerName}. Allow me to introduce myself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Female Instructor
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My name is Yingzhu, I work for the textbook department of the Jinzhou Institute. I’m currently responsible for writing an extracurricular magazine for the students.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It’s called “A Look Inside Jinzhou”, to broaden students’ horizons and satisfy their curiosity.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But my sister thought the draft was too narrow in terms of who would be interested in it. If it doesn’t catch on, it won’t serve its purpose of helping people learn.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, do you mind helping us by taking a small test?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It’s only a simple quiz. It wouldn’t matter if you answer them correctly or not.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I just want to confirm whether the learning points are that uncommon and perplexing or not.

Options.PlotLineKey: I’m pretty confident with my know-how.
I hope I won’t make a fool of myself.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I can’t thank you enough!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I look forward to your performance.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can just think of it as us having a casual chat. I’m also curious about what you’ve seen and heard in Jinzhou so far.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The test results will be kept confidential, and will only be used as a reference for future writing changes.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: So you don’t need to worry too much, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The first question is about the Sentinel of Jinzhou, which is super basic!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What is the Sentinel of Jinzhou called?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The next question is about a widely used scientific technology called Tacetite Weapons.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Which department of the Huaxu Academy is responsible for making Tacetite Weapons?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This question is about a special dish from Jinzhou.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Which of these isn’t in the recipe for famous Spicy Pulled Chicken?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: These Q&A gave me fresh ideas for our next issue of “Jinzhou: A Closer Look”.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I missed a bunch of stuff by working alone before...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Please take these rewards, you earned them.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Your feedback is super helpful!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Can we ask for your help again in the future?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: No, we can’t keep bothering {PlayerName} like this…

Options.PlotLineKey: I don’t mind helping you again.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When “Jinzhou: A Closer Look” is published, I will surely put your name on the acknowledgement page!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Looking forward to a great collaboration ahead.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We’ll have more Q&A next time, so get ready!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Rest assured, we won’t let you contribute for nothing.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As a token of thanks, I will also put your name on the acknowledgement page.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes! {PlayerName}’s help is worth remembering!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}, next time I will also prepare some questions. They’ll be way more interesting than my sister’s.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xingzhu
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Looking forward to a great collaboration ahead.
